mapper.select: select * from ( select b.*, rownum r from ( select * from qna_board order by postNo desc ) b ) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into qna_board values( qna_board_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imgName}, #{imgPath}, #{originalName}, #{showRecord}, sysdate, 0, 0, 0 )
mapper.update: update qna_board set views = views + 1 where postNo = #{postNo}
update qna_board set title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content}, imgName=#{imgName}, imgPath=#{imgPath}, originalName=#{originalName}, showRecord=#{showRecord} where postNo=#{postNo}
update qna_board set isAnswered=1 where postNo=#{postNo}
